wikipedia_page.main: James Gordon (c.1758–1822) was a British barrister, politician and plantation owner on Antigua and St Vincent.

response: Whitbread married firstly Harriet Hayton, by whom he had two daughters, one of whom, Emma Maria Elizabeth Whitbread, married Henry St John, 13th Baron St John of Bletso, and one son, the politician, Samuel Whitbread. The other daughter, Harriet, married James Gordon MP. Harriet died in 1769 and is buried in Cardington Parish Church. Her memorial is by Richard Hayward.Dictionary of British Sculptors 1660-1851 by Peter Gunnis.
